title: 1978 World Championship Tennis Finals – Singles
text:
<a href="Jimmy%20Connors">Jimmy Connors</a> was the defending champion but did not compete that year.
<a href="Vitas%20Gerulaitis">Vitas Gerulaitis</a> won in the final 6–3, 6–2, 6–1 against <a href="Eddie%20Dibbs">Eddie Dibbs</a>.
Seeds.
A champion seed is indicated in bold text while text in italics indicates the round in which that seed was eliminated.
